timeline.bodyText:
Please try to put violation comment on same line where violation is. To follow 100 chars per line rule, some code can be shorter or wrapped.
You can make violation explanation shorter as well.
timeline.author: strkkk
strkkk
strkkk
strkkk

timeline.bodyText: under MethodParamPad,  user does not need this
timeline.author: strkkk

replies.bodyText: Removed that part and put the example together with the rest of the > violations
replies.author: wltan

timeline.bodyText:
this line shows same thing as previous one.
Lets make it like this - one example for both '<' and '>'

is followed
is not followed
is preceded
is not preceded

So there should be total 8 lines.
timeline.author: strkkk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -71,10 +77,17 @@ * MyClass obj = new <String>MyClass(); * *

- * To configure the check: + * Examples with incorrect spacing: *

* 
- * <module name="GenericWhitespace"/>
+ * Box<String> b = Box. <String>of("foo"); // violation, "<" preceded with whitespace
+ * Queue <Integer> q; // violation, "<" preceded with whitespace
+ * List< String> l; // violation, "<" followed with whitespace
+ *
+ * Pair<Integer, Integer > p; // violation, ">" preceded with whitespace
+ * Map<Integer, String>m; // violation, ">" not followed with whitespace
+ * List<Integer> a = new ArrayList<> (); // violation, ">" followed with whitespace
+ * Box<String> b = Box.<String> of("bar"); // violation, ">" followed with whitespace

replies.bodyText:
I think '<' not followed by whitespace and '>' not preceded by whitespace are always valid? So there are no examples that cause violation for those 2 cases. Good examples are already listed above this part.
I will reorganize the examples for the other 6 cases.
replies.author: wltan

replies.bodyText: Yes, you are correct, 6 cases are ok.
replies.author: strkkk

timeline.bodyText:
Box<String> violation here is in right side of expression, so to make it clearer use '<' and '>' only in place where violation occurs.
For example, here it can be like
Box b = // here is code with violation
timeline.author: strkkk
